opinion_text.center: For syllabus, see State v. Cassill, ante, p. 381.

posture.italic: Appeal from District Court, Powell County; George B. Winston,

opinion.opinion_text:
This cause was submitted upon conditions precisely similar to those appearing in No. 5,593, State v. Cassill, ante, p. 381233 P. 908.
For the same reasons assigned in that cause, the judgment herein is affirmed.
Affirmed.
